title: The electric beauty of Morocco's incredible blue city
text: BING NEWS: Chefchaouen: The electric beauty of Morocco's incredible blue city (CNN)Surrounded on all sides by epic m ountain scenery and with a 500-year-old fortress at its center, the city of Chefchaouen -- or Chaouen for short -- is becoming a new "it" place on Morocco's tourist trail.
